reviewText: I loved Doc Hollywood and Michael.Mr Wonderful was ok.Doc Hollywood and Michael are must see for the PG 13(small amount of nudity)entire family.Must haves for anyones collection.City of Angels another must have family favorite!
Title: Doc Hollywood & Mr Wonderful & Michael

Title: Doc Hollywood & Mr Wonderful & Michael

reviewText: Doc Hollywood is the BEST EVER! It was great to find all three of these good movies in one. I bought it as a gift and received a lovely "Thank You" card and they said they will enjoy it over and over; oh, and their favorite was Doc Hollywood too.
Title: Doc Hollywood & Mr Wonderful & Michael

reviewText: I enjoy this light hearted movie. I love the pig!!! I loved the scene with them in the boat watching the fireworks, great scene.
Title: Doc Hollywood & Mr Wonderful & Michael

reviewText: I really purchased this DVD for the movie "Doc Hollywood". I did not realize that the other movies were on the DVD until I received it. I enjoyed watch Doc Hollywood as it is one of my favorite Michael J Fox movies. I never watched the others.
Title: Doc Hollywood & Mr Wonderful & Michael

reviewText: We own this tape and watch it at least once a month.  We love Michael J. Fox and enjoyed him and the rest of the cast.  This is a light, humerous love story (in my opinion) and can be watched over and over.  This one is a keeper.
Title: Doc Hollywood & Mr Wonderful & Michael
